dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: If false, processing of tasks in this queue is paused.

dcmMaxTasksParallel.title: Maximum parallel Tasks
dcmMaxTasksParallel.description: Maximal number of tasks processed in parallel.

dicomDescription.title: DICOM Description
dicomDescription.description: Textual description of the DICOM entity

dcmMaxRetries.title: Maximum Number of Retries
dcmMaxRetries.description: Maximal number of retries to process tasks scheduled in a specific queue.

dcmRetryDelay.title: Retry Delay
dcmRetryDelay.description: Delay to retry to process tasks scheduled in a specific queue in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS.

dcmMaxRetryDelay.title: Maximum Retry Delay
dcmMaxRetryDelay.description: Maximal Delay to retry to process tasks scheduled in a specific queue in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS. Infinite if absent.

dcmRetryDelayMultiplier.title: Retry Delay Multiplier
dcmRetryDelayMultiplier.description: Multiplier in % that will take effect on top of dcmRetryDelay with dcmMaxRetryDelay to be taken into account.

dcmRetryOnWarning.title: Retry on Warning
dcmRetryOnWarning.description: Enables retries to process tasks not only on failure but also on a warning outcome status in a specific queue.

dcmPurgeQueueMessageCompletedDelay.title: Delay for purging completed tasks
dcmPurgeQueueMessageCompletedDelay.description: Delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS after which completed tasks are purged. If absent, there is no deletion for that particular queue

dcmPurgeQueueMessageFailedDelay.title: Delay for purging failed tasks
dcmPurgeQueueMessageFailedDelay.description: Delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS after which failed tasks are purged. If absent, there is no deletion for that particular queue

dcmPurgeQueueMessageWarningDelay.title: Delay for purging warning tasks
dcmPurgeQueueMessageWarningDelay.description: Delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS after which warning tasks are purged. If absent, there is no deletion for that particular queue

dcmPurgeQueueMessageCanceledDelay.title: Delay for purging canceled tasks
dcmPurgeQueueMessageCanceledDelay.description: Delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS after which canceled tasks are purged. If absent, there is no deletion for that particular queue

dcmSchedule.title: Restrict Scheduling
dcmSchedule.description: Restrict Scheduling to specified time ranges.
